title: Twitter clone
content: Utilizes Twitter API to retrieve and display tweets.
Created an internal API to communicate and grab data from the database.
It has full user authentication using JSON Web Tokens.
Responsive, user-friendly and used various technologies, including the MERN stack.
Tested website and performed troubleshooting before live deployment.
projectIntro: Elegant look and well-structured code. The idea behind this project was to create a twitter-clone. It's a single-page application that was built with reactJs as the front-end and node for the back-end.

title: Clothing Shop
content: Designed and developed the entire application.
Used Stripe for credit card payment gateways.
Created an internal API to communicate and grab data from the database.
Full user authentication and authorization using JSON Web Tokens.
Tested website for cross-browser compatibility.
projectIntro: Fully functional e-commerce website with beautiful and clean UX design. This project is built using React for the frontend and NodeJs in the backend. It has a checkout page and uses Stripe for payment gateways.

title: Web Design Agency
content: For this project, I made a single page application using reactJs and sass.
The Application is mobile-friendly and responsive.
Used react-router and react-scroll to navigate through different pages.
Implemented form submission and good UX experience.
projectIntro: With appealing colors and a clean UX design, this project layout is truly inspiring. This Application is mobile-friendly and fully responsive.

title: Community App
content: This application has search functionality if you're looking for a specific user or area.
It has full user authentication and authorization using passport.js.
Used google maps api to display users in your residential area.
Worked with mongoDB database to collect user data.
CRUD with nodejs and express, SASS, javaScript and more.
projectIntro: Amazing design and a bright idea, this project aimed to create a platform that brings the community together. You sign up to the website and instantly see the other users in your area.

title: Covdi-19 tracker
content: Utilized disease.sh API to get the data.
Used react-leaflet to display maps.
Displays live charts using react-charts
Responsive and user-friendly
projectIntro: Adaptive design and great user experience, this application showcases a live update of covid-19 global stats and it was built in reactJs.
